pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Tools for Topological Data Analysis // Tools for Topological Data Analysis. The package focuses on statistical analysis of persistent homology and density clustering. For that, this package provides an R interface for the efficient algorithms of the C++ libraries 'GUDHI' https://project.inria.fr/gudhi/software/, 'Dionysus' https://www.mrzv.org/software/dionysus/, and 'PHAT' https://bitbucket.org/phat-code/phat/. This package also implements methods from Fasy et al. (2014) doi:10.1214/14-AOS1252 and Chazal et al. (2015) doi:10.20382/jocg.v6i2a8 for analyzing the statistical significance of persistent homology features.
